snippet: Italy suggested on Sunday it was unlikely to sell a stake in state utility firm Enel by the end of the year as planned, citing poor market conditions, but instead hinted it could step in to buy troubled steel maker Ilva....

headline.print_headline: Italy Stalls on Enel Stake Sale, May Buy Ilva
headline.main: Italy Stalls on Enel Stake Sale, May Buy Ilva

lead_paragraph: Italy suggested on Sunday it was unlikely to sell a stake in state utility firm Enel by the end of the year as planned, citing poor market conditions, but instead hinted it could step in to buy troubled steel maker Ilva.
